sentence.Network_en: Diners can enjoy an uninterrupted view of the garden.
sentence.Network_cn: 用餐者对花园的景色一览无余。

sentence.Network_en: This enables the healing process to continue uninterrupted.
sentence.Network_cn: 这样能使恢复过程不间断地进行下去。

sentence.Network_en: We had an uninterrupted view of the stage.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们能清楚地看见舞台。

entry.def: If something is uninterrupted, it is continuous and has no breaks or interruptions in it.

example.ex: This enables the healing process to continue uninterrupted...
example.tran: 这样能使恢复过程不间断地进行下去。

example.ex: His hearing remained good, so that his contact with the world was uninterrupted.
example.tran: 他的听力尚佳，因此他与外界的联系没有中断。

entry.def: An uninterrupted view of something is a clear view of it, without any obstacles in the way.

example.ex: Diners can enjoy an uninterrupted view of the garden.
example.tran: 用餐者对花园的景色一览无余。

means.word_mean: 2. continuing in time or space without interruption;

sentences.sentence: "a continuous rearrangement of electrons in the solar atoms results in the emission of light"- James Jeans
"a continuous bout of illness lasting six months"
"a continuous line has no gaps or breaks in it"
"moving midweek holidays to the nearest Monday or Friday allows uninterrupted work weeks"

auth_sentence.content: I don't think anyone's life went uninterrupted.
auth_sentence.res_content: I don't think anyone's life went uninterrupted.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I don't think anyone's life went uninterrupted.

auth_sentence.content: They extend uninterrupted around the Hirshhorn's curved galleries.
auth_sentence.res_content: They extend uninterrupted around the Hirshhorn's curved galleries.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They extend uninterrupted around the Hirshhorn's curved galleries.

auth_sentence.content: His career was one of uninterrupted success.
auth_sentence.res_content: His career was one of uninterrupted success.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His career was one of uninterrupted success.

Sentence.sentence: Even Intel experimented in 2007 with conferring four uninterrupted hours of quiet time (no phone or e-mail) every Tuesday morning on 300 engineers and managers.

sentences.en: She was uninterrupted with the entrance of an attendant.
sentences.cn: 服务员进来并没有打断她的话。
